title: Strengthening Science and Technology Communication Competencies Through Social Justice-Based OER Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in documenting basic scientific knowledge and technical skills
context.additional_context: Social equity improvement project utilizing OER (Open Educational Resources) through smartphone-based learning

learning_goals: Learners can search for and evaluate at least five science and technology communication resources on an OER platform.
Learners can produce and share one OER content item to improve information accessibility for socially vulnerable groups.
Learners can explain at least three strategies to resolve copyright and licensing issues when publishing or sharing technical documents.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
